subject: Order #SSN5568
description_text:
I have only just received my pedals and I did not receive any of my
haptics. Are these on the way and if not, are we able to have some sent?
Cheers

conversations.body_text: Hi Blair Bennett,  ​It is found that your order will be shipped in two packages:  ​​Your power supply is on the way and is expected to arrive around the 22nd.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224804965
